message.content: {"id": "14047", "title": "Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap", "description": "", "OB": "When making changes to the text in the StyledText widget with word wrap enabled, the widget inefficiently redraws the entire text. This can cause performance issues when dealing with large amounts of text.", "EB": "Optimize the redraw process in the StyledText widget when changes are made to the text with word wrap enabled. Only redraw the necessary portions of the text to improve performance.", "SR": "To investigate the redraws occurring during text changes in the StyledText widget with word wrap, add the following line to the performPaint method in the StyledText class:\n\nSystem.out.println(\"lineCount \" + lineCount + \", paintY \" + paintY + \", renderHeight \" + renderHeight);"}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '14047', 'title': 'Bug 14047StyledText  inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Add the following line toStyledTextperformPaint to see the redraws occurring:System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ",renderHeight " + renderHeight); '}
